summary: This is an email from a Human Resource Manager at MCC New York regarding the issuance of memorandums restricting an unnamed female individual and another person referred to as 'Ma' to the first floor of the facility. It instructs the recipient to have the documents signed and distributed.

persons.name: Human Resource Manager
persons.role: Human Resource Manager at MCC New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, instructing the recipient to issue and manage memorandums regarding the restriction of two individuals.

events.title: Issuance of Restriction Memorandums
events.description: An email is sent instructing the issuance of memorandums to restrict an unnamed female individual and 'Ma' to the first floor of MCC New York.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email dated August 12, 2019, concerning facility restrictions at MCC New York.
It references the restriction of an unnamed female individual to the first floor of the facility.
It also references the restriction of another individual referred to only as 'Ma'.
The correspondence indicates a formal process involving signed memorandums to be distributed and filed.
